short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browser with Rollio. Give back hours of time to sales & service, and start capturing missing & accurate CRM data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say “Hello” to your new AI assistant. Rollio™ works with your CRM including Salesforce™ Sales and Service Cloud, allowing you to use human language to enter data into and retrieve data out of your CRM. Text your CRM, rather than waste time filling out clunky forms. Send a text, and Rollio will break your message and put every piece of data into the appropriate fields.
